00031 template <typename _ExtIterator, typename _UnaryFunction>
00032 _UnaryFunction for_each(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, _UnaryFunction _functor, int_type nbuffers)
00033 {
00034     typedef buf_istream < typename _ExtIterator::block_type, typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_istream_type;
00035 
00036     _begin.flush();     // flush container
00037 
00038     // create prefetching stream,
00039     buf_istream_type in(_begin.bid(), _end.bid() + ((_end.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0), nbuffers / 2);
00040 
00041     _ExtIterator _cur = _begin - _begin.block_offset();
00042 
00043     // leave part of the block before _begin untouched (e.g. copy)
00044     for ( ; _cur != _begin; ++_cur)
00045     {
00046         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00047         in >> tmp;
00048     }
00049 
00050     // apply _functor to the range [_begin,_end)
00051     for ( ; _cur != _end; ++_cur)
00052     {
00053         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00054         in >> tmp;
00055         _functor(tmp);
00056     }
00057 
00058     // leave part of the block after _end untouched
00059     if (_end.block_offset())
00060     {
00061         _ExtIterator _last_block_end = _end - _end.block_offset() + _ExtIterator::block_type::size;
00062         for ( ; _cur != _last_block_end; ++_cur)
00063         {
00064             typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00065             in >> tmp;
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069     return _functor;
00070 }
00071

00082 template <typename _ExtIterator, typename _UnaryFunction>
00083 _UnaryFunction for_each_m(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, _UnaryFunction _functor, int_type nbuffers)
00084 {
00085     typedef buf_istream < typename _ExtIterator::block_type, typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_istream_type;
00086     typedef buf_ostream < typename _ExtIterator::block_type, typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_ostream_type;
00087 
00088     _begin.flush();     // flush container
00089 
00090     // create prefetching stream,
00091     buf_istream_type in(_begin.bid(), _end.bid() + ((_end.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0), nbuffers / 2);
00092     // create buffered write stream for blocks
00093     buf_ostream_type out(_begin.bid(), nbuffers / 2);
00094     // REMARK: these two streams do I/O while
00095     //         _functor is being computed (overlapping for free)
00096 
00097     _ExtIterator _cur = _begin - _begin.block_offset();
00098 
00099     // leave part of the block before _begin untouched (e.g. copy)
00100     for ( ; _cur != _begin; ++_cur)
00101     {
00102         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00103         in >> tmp;
00104         out << tmp;
00105     }
00106 
00107     // apply _functor to the range [_begin,_end)
00108     for ( ; _cur != _end; ++_cur)
00109     {
00110         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00111         in >> tmp;
00112         _functor(tmp);
00113         out << tmp;
00114     }
00115 
00116     // leave part of the block after _end untouched
00117     if (_end.block_offset())
00118     {
00119         _ExtIterator _last_block_end = _end - _end.block_offset() + _ExtIterator::block_type::size;
00120         for ( ; _cur != _last_block_end; ++_cur)
00121         {
00122             typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00123             in >> tmp;
00124             out << tmp;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return _functor;
00129 }

00138 template <typename _ExtIterator, typename _Generator>
00139 void generate(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, _Generator _generator, int_type nbuffers)
00140 {
00141     typedef typename _ExtIterator::block_type block_type;
00142     typedef buf_ostream < block_type, typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_ostream_type;
00143 
00144 
00145     while (_begin.block_offset())    //  go to the beginning of the block
00146     //  of the external vector
00147     {
00148         if (_begin == _end)
00149             return;
00150 
00151         *_begin = _generator();
00152         ++_begin;
00153     }
00154 
00155     _begin.flush();     // flush container
00156 
00157     // create buffered write stream for blocks
00158     buf_ostream_type outstream(_begin.bid(), nbuffers);
00159 
00160     assert(_begin.block_offset() == 0);
00161 
00162     while (_end != _begin)
00163     {
00164         if (_begin.block_offset() == 0)
00165             _begin.touch();
00166 
00167         *outstream = _generator();
00168         ++_begin;
00169         ++outstream;
00170     }
00171 
00172     typename _ExtIterator::const_iterator out = _begin;
00173 
00174     while (out.block_offset())    // filling the rest of the block
00175     {
00176         *outstream = *out;
00177         ++out;
00178         ++outstream;
00179     }
00180     _begin.flush();
00181 }
00182 
00191 template <typename _ExtIterator, typename _EqualityComparable>
00192 _ExtIterator find(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, const _EqualityComparable & _value, int_type nbuffers)
00193 {
00194     typedef buf_istream < typename _ExtIterator::block_type, typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_istream_type;
00195 
00196     _begin.flush();     // flush container
00197 
00198     // create prefetching stream,
00199     buf_istream_type in(_begin.bid(), _end.bid() + ((_end.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0), nbuffers);
00200 
00201     _ExtIterator _cur = _begin - _begin.block_offset();
00202 
00203     // skip part of the block before _begin untouched
00204     for ( ; _cur != _begin; ++_cur)
00205         ++in;
00206 
00207 
00208     // search in the the range [_begin,_end)
00209     for ( ; _cur != _end; ++_cur)
00210     {
00211         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00212         in >> tmp;
00213         if (tmp == _value)
00214             return _cur;
00215     }
00216 
00217     return _cur;
00218 }
